vote.title: Authorize a five-year service contract, with two one-year renewal options, for banking depository services for the City Controller’s Office and Water Utilities Department - JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A., most advantageous proposer of seven - Not to exceed $1,596,992.11 - Financing:  General Fund ($1,277,593.69) and Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($319,398.42) (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize a five-year service contract, with two one-year renewal options, for banking depository services for the City Controller’s Office and Water Utilities Department - JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A., most advantageous proposer of seven - Not to exceed $1,596,992.11 - Financing:  General Fund ($1,277,593.69) and Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($319,398.42) (subject to annual appropriations)
